trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030REPLICATALK_00176_HUBAIRTIN_000_000<tab>Advanced materia melding is a highly unstable process. There <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be a way to harness the stones' power without risking their destruction...

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030REPLICATALK_00176_HUBAIRTIN_000_030<tab>When a sphere scroll is fully infused with materia, it will shine as the stars in the heavens. This is the sign that its power is ready to be transferred to a suitable vessel.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030REPLICATALK_00176_HUBAIRTIN_000_050<tab>By the gods, you...you've succeeded! <var 1A 02 /var>We've<var 1A 01 /var> succeeded! To think that my efforts have finally borne fruit... No words can express the joy I feel at this moment.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030REPLICATALK_00176_HUBAIRTIN_000_051<tab>To be sure, my research is far from over. Much and more must be verified before I can form my conclusions, and so I would be much obliged for our ongoing collaboration.

TEXT_CMNDEFRELICWEAPON030REPLICATALK_00176_HUBAIRTIN_000_052<tab>If you have a mind to enhance another relic, bring me the requisite amount of superior enchanted ink, and I shall prepare for you a suitable sphere scroll.
